history.proof: intros H. apply Lim_seq_correct in H as Hu. apply is_lim_seq_abs in Hu. qsimpl time: 1 use: Lim_seq_correct. srun best use: is_lim_seq_unique.

ctx: apply Lim_seq_correct in H as Hu.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall u : nat -> R, ex_lim_seq u -> is_lim_seq u (Lim_seq u)" on hypothesis of type "is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => Rabs (u n)) (Rbar_abs (Lim_seq u))".

original: intros H. apply Lim_seq_correct in H as Hu. apply is_lim_seq_abs in Hu. apply Lim_seq_correct in Hu. rewrite Hu. reflexivity.
